                <ul class="report_reason report_reason1">
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error1_one" data-type="25" name="haojia_error1" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error1_one"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error1_one" class="">图文不符</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error1_two" data-type="26" name="haojia_error1" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error1_two"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error1_two" class="">标题、正文描述有误</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error1_three" data-type="16" name="haojia_error1" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error1_three"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error1_three" class="">数量、价格等错误</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error1_four" data-type="19" name="haojia_error1" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error1_four"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error1_four" class="">虚假宣传</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error1_five" data-type="20" name="haojia_error1" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error1_five"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error1_five" class="">虚假互动</label>
                    </li>
                </ul>
                <button>确认提交</button>
            </div>
        </li>

        <li class="li other goods" id="other_report_reason1" data-name="商品问题">商品问题
            <div class="other_report_box goods_report_box">
                请选择举报理由：
                <ul class="report_reason report_reason1">
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="report_reason_one" data-type="18" name="report_reason" class="rd">

                    </li>
                </ul>
                <button>确认提交</button>
            </div>
        </li>

        <li class="li other goods" id="haojia_error2" data-name="侵权举报">
            侵权举报
            <div class="other_report_box goods_report_box">
                请选择举报理由：
                <ul class="report_reason report_reason1">
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error2_one" data-type="21" name="haojia_error2" class="rd">

            </div>
        </li>
        <!-- 新增其他举报 -->
        <li class="li other goods" data-name="其他" data-type="29" id="other_alert">
            其他
        </li>
    </ul>
</div>
      <!--打分模块-   id 是  rating_  +  文章id  -->
